### Usage:
```
Rscript -e "rmarkdown::render('making-vidoes.Rmd',
                              clean = TRUE,
                              params = list(api_key=${API_KEY}))"
```

Load the library
```{r setup}
library(mario)
```

## Set up the API key

```{r}
Sys.setenv(CONNECT_API_KEY = params$api_key)
```

## Declare slide ID
```{r}
# Google slide ID
id <- "1sFsRXfK7LKxFm-ydib5dxyQU9fYujb95katPRu0WVZk"
```

## Run the conversion!
```{r}
# Run mario!
res <- mario::mario(id,
  voice = "en-US-Wavenet-F")

# Write the video
mario::mario_write_video(
  res,
  output_file = "new_video")
```

sessionInfo()
